subject: p19389547
History: Patient with tracheoplasty evaluate lung expansion.
Findings: There are low lung volumes. There is elevation of the left hemidiaphragm. There is a large area of atelectasis in the periphery of the left lower lobe. There is a right chest tube. There is no pneumothorax. If any, there is a small right pleural effusion. There is mild atelectasis in the right lower lobe. The mediastinum is slightly widened. Cardiac size is stable.
